Class PerlActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
      • eg.projects.PerlActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class PerlActions
extends ProjectConfig
implements ProjectActions
    Represents a programming project in Perl

      • configureProject

        public boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Description copied from class: ProjectConfig
        If a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in the settings window.

        In the case of success the frame of [@link SettingsWin} is closed.

        Specified by:
        configureProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        configureProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or include the project's root folder
        Returns:
        if a project can be successfully configured based on entries in this settings window

      • retrieveProject

        public boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Description copied from class: ProjectConfig
        If a project configuration stored in 'config' or 'prefs' can be retrieved.

        Method first looks for a config file and, if not present, in the preferences file in the program folder.

        Specified by:
        retrieveProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        retrieveProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory of a file that maybe part of the project
        Returns:
        If a project configuration stored in 'config' or 'prefs' can be retrieved
